title: Backend developer needed
shortDescription: [Joystream Video DAO](https://www.joystream.org/) is actively looking for a Backend Developer to join **Builders**, the community developers team
description:
[Joystream Video DAO](https://www.joystream.org/) is actively looking for a Backend Developer to join **Builders**, the community developers team.

Who are we:

* Joystream is an open-source blockchain project that will be truly user-governed 

* [Builders](https://joystream.notion.site/Who-we-are-d34c0f54ac804b429db4c260ddac29ba) are a small groups of engineers helping to make Jsgenesis products better

Who are you:

1. Currently employed (have a day job) 

2. Have at least 2 years of commercial experience in Javascript backend development 

3. Node.js 

4. Typescript, Axios 

5. GraphQL 

6. PostgreSQL 

7. Dev Ops 

8. Git 

9. Self-starter 

10. Fast learner

11. Polkadot background will be an advantage 

12. Nest.js background will be an advantage 

 [üìù Apply Today!](https://dao.joystream.org/#/working-groups/openings/operationsWorkingGroupAlpha-36)

applicationFormQuestions.question: Years of experience in Node.js / Typescript
Years of experience with Dev Ops
Tell us a bit about youself
Your availability, in hours per day
Do you understand the compensation model?
Recommend us an awesome video channel
